video_prompt: A resolute woman on a futuristic, heavily armed vehicle speeds through a desolate, dusty landscape. Her hair whips back, sunglasses gleam, and mouth is set. The vehicle's wheels spin, weapons shift slightly, and a digital interface flickers. The background blurs, emphasizing intense motion and implied danger.
image_prompt: Full-shot, powerful determined female warrior/mercenary on heavily armed futuristic tricycle/quad bike, blurred dusty desert/war-torn urban landscape background, conveying speed and motion. Young fair-skinned woman, shoulder-length light brown hair swept back, piercing yellow-tinted sunglasses, firm mouth. Multi-layered blue/grey tactical suit with armor plating (shoulders, chest, forearms, shins), high collar, textured gloves. On her back: long multi-barreled dark grey weapons (gatling guns/rocket launchers). Vehicle: worn metallic white/light grey, industrial fasteners, streamlined, subtle damage, front panel screen with colorful digital interface. Side clusters of multi-barreled guns. Robust wheels, metallic suspension. Bright even lighting. Logo "c29" bottom right.
refined_video_prompt: Her hair whips violently, sunglasses gleaming, as a resolute expression holds steady. Vehicle wheels churn, weaponry subtly adjusts, and digital displays flicker. The background streaks past, emphasizing immense velocity and mounting peril.
